#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
inline int inp()
{
int noRead=0;
char p=getchar_unlocked();
for(;p<33;){p=getchar_unlocked();};
while(p>32)
{
noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
p=getchar_unlocked();
}
return noRead;
};
int main()
{
    int t,n,k,l,a[9],i;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        n=inp();k=inp();//scanf("%d,%d",&n,&k);
        k=k-1;a[0]=a[n-1]=1;
        if(n%2==0)l=n/2-1;
        else l=n/2;
        for(i=l;i>=1;i--)
        {
            a[i]=a[n-i-1]=k%10;
            k=k/10;
        }
        if(k!=0)a[0]=a[n-1]=(k%10+1);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        printf("%d",a[i]);
        printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
